root.name: Hoyle Word Games
root.description: There are nine games available:Anagrams - find as many words using the scrambled letters in the 90 seconds provided.CrosswordsDoubleCross - similar to ScrabbleEnigma - decoding cryptograms. Named after the code-breaking machine used during World War II.HangmanSpeedy Racer - type the words on screen before they disappear or hit the groundWord SearchesWorld Yacht - similar to Yahtzee, except for words.
